head.title: Needed: An Inquiry From the Outside

hedline.hl1: Needed: An Inquiry From the Outside

block.p: John Tierney should stop projecting Republicans' fear of accountability onto the Democratic Party.
This Democrat, for one, and many I know, could not care less about the political party affiliation of those responsible for the disaster that has been the federal response to Hurricane Katrina.
John Tierney should stop projecting Republicans' fear of accountability onto the Democratic Party.
This Democrat, for one, and many I know, could not care less about the political party affiliation of those responsible for the disaster that has been the federal response to Hurricane Katrina.
It's time to quit placing our political parties' images ahead of the best interests of our nation.
Americans are outraged at this government's incompetence. The federal government has failed our fellow citizens. Let an independent investigation go forward; let the chips fall where they may.
